People.name: John Carson
People.Certification: Swiftwater Rescue Technician, SRT, Whitewater Rescue Technician and WRT.
People.Brief: I love to do extreme sports, and my 15 years of experience has taught me how do this in a way thats both fun and safe for any adventurer. I make it my priority for everone to enjoy the river in a truly unforgetable way.

People.name: Steve Smith
People.Certification: Swiftwater Rescue Technician, SRT, Whitewater Rescue Technician, WRT and ACA Raft Guide Instructor Course
People.Brief: My passion for the otudoors bring me to this beautiful area in Idaho.I have undergone special training that has prepaired me with the skills to bring you the enjoyment and security that you deserve while on the river.

People.name: David Olson
People.Certification: Swiftwater Rescue Technician, SRT, Whitewater Rescue Technician, WRT and boat certification
People.Brief: Im an Idaho native, and I have a deep love for this wonderful state. As I was growing up, I made it my goal to show this wonderful state to other people. I make it my mission to give the best service to my clients.
